org.apache.archiva.repository

Interface RepositoryContentProvider

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    MavenContentProvider

    public interface RepositoryContentProvider
    A repository content provider creates repository content instances for specific repository types.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      <T extends RepositoryContent,V extends Repository>
      T      		 createContent(Class<T> clazz, V repository)
      Creates a generic content object.
      ManagedRepositoryContent createManagedContent(ManagedRepository repository)
      Creates a new instance of ManagedRepositoryContent.
      RemoteRepositoryContent createRemoteContent(RemoteRepository repository)
      Creates a new instance of RemoteRepositoryContent.
      Set<RepositoryType> getSupportedRepositoryTypes()
      Returns the repository types, this content object can be used for.
      boolean supports(RepositoryType type)
      Returns true, if this content object supports the given repository type.
      boolean supportsLayout(String layout)
      Returns true, if this content object supports the given layout otherwise, false.

    • Method Detail

      • supportsLayout

        boolean supportsLayout(String layout)
        Returns true, if this content object supports the given layout otherwise, false.
        Parameters:
        layout - the layout string
        Returns:
        true, if layout is supported, otherwise false.

      • getSupportedRepositoryTypes

        Set<RepositoryType> getSupportedRepositoryTypes()
        Returns the repository types, this content object can be used for.
        Returns:
        all supported repository types.

      • supports

        boolean supports(RepositoryType type)
        Returns true, if this content object supports the given repository type.
        Parameters:
        type - the type to check.
        Returns:
        true, if the type is supported, otherwise false.

      • createRemoteContent

        RemoteRepositoryContent createRemoteContent(RemoteRepository repository)
                                     throws RepositoryException
        Creates a new instance of RemoteRepositoryContent. The returned instance should be initialized from the given repository data.
        Parameters:
        repository - the repository
        Returns:
        a repository content instance
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if the layout is not supported, or a error occured during initialization

      • createManagedContent

        ManagedRepositoryContent createManagedContent(ManagedRepository repository)
                                       throws RepositoryException
        Creates a new instance of ManagedRepositoryContent.
        Parameters:
        repository - the repository
        Returns:
        a new instance
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if the layout is not supported, or a error occured during initialization

      • createContent

        <T extends RepositoryContent,V extends Repository> T createContent(Class<T> clazz,
                                                                   V repository)
                                                            throws RepositoryException
        Creates a generic content object.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type of the content
        V - the generic type of the repository (must correspond to the content class)
        Parameters:
        repository - the repository
        clazz - the content class
        Returns:
        a new instance
        Throws:
        RepositoryException - if the clazz, or layout is not supported, or something went wrong during initialization
